programme.title: Desperate Housewives
Kućanice
programme.desc:
Desperate Housewives: Created by Marc Cherry. With Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross, Eva Longoria. Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0410975/","name":"Desperate Housewives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzI2MTFjZDktYTZhNS00YTU2LWI5ZTMtM2MzNDU1YjNhNTJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0410975/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"critical-escapist"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A huge surprise on Wisteria Lane","reviewBody":"All I can say about this show is: You gotta love the dirty laundry!

At first when I saw the pilots, it was like: What the heck? Are they serious that they were going to make a show about a bunch of shallow people living on a street having sex and complaining about not having enough sex? But at the end, I was wrong.

This is a show about misunderstood and troubled people who really cares about each other and shows it. They are human and they hurt people like everyday-people do. I love this show and it is so humane and the characters are so likable in every single way.

The desperate housewives are portrayed by Teri Hatcher, Marcia Cross, Felicity Huffman, and Eva Longoria. As much I hate the character Gabrielle, I have to say, I have to love Eva Logoria's charm because she is delightful to watch as a person in interviews. I love the character Bree. She is so stunning to watch as this perfectionist with a family that is nothing but 'perfect.' Felicity Huffman plays the real everyday-mom who's stressed - Lynette, who's also an great character. There's Teri Hatcher's character, Susan, which I liked at first but she gets boring but she does have a great cheerleader, her daughter Julie, who is probably much more likable than her.

And there's Edie Britt ... the 'slut' of the neighborhood. I hated her at first, but then, slowly, loved her.

What makes this show so creative is that it is narrated by a housewife that committed suicide on episode one. It is an extremely nice turn in television.

This is my favorite show ... next to Lost. ABC is doing very well this season."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122531,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-10-03","keywords":"conflict of interest,female protagonist,friend,neighborhood,suicide","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005031/","name":"Felicity Huffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189220/","name":"Marcia Cross"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028589/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156100/","name":"Marc Cherry"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperate Housewives: The Complete Sixth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1644955417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TT #1"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Underworld: Awakening: Directed by Måns Mårlind, Björn Stein. With Kate Beckinsale, Stephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Theo James. When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1496025/","name":"Underworld: Awakening","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMjc0ODk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTc5NDQwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1496025/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Floated2"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Action","reviewBody":"Having just watched Underworld Awakening and not being an avid fan of the previous films in the series (not watching them), my stance on this film may not be as accurate as to those whom have seen the entire films in chronological order. However then I am reviewing this film based on this one solely. I thoroughly enjoyed, found the action top notch, well directed and fast paced. I know some of the complaints are due to the thin story but I did not mind too much. Yes a better story could have made the film better but I enjoyed the mother-daughter relationship and how and what they had to do in order to save her, and her whole escape plan. Kate Beckinsale is great as Selene as well as the other supporting actors. The Lycans and vampires were an interesting take in this, as well as the final scene involving Selene having to fight the giant Lycan. The 3D was believable and so were the gimmicks. For an action movie, it delivers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":150805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2012-01-20","keywords":"vampire,selene character,woman fights a man,woman murders a man,murderess","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1011654169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NDE5MDUyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzM1NzQyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NDE5MDUyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzM1NzQyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. programme.desc: Beowulf: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Robin Wright, Anthony Hopkins, Paul Baker, John Bilezikjian. The bitter flavor of confrontations. And the seed of the victory. Impressive, shocking in few scenes, it is a precise exploration of a world who becomes less familiar. Because, behind shadows and animation, violence and nudity, the message of "Beowulf" becomes more clear. And usefull. programme.title: Erin Brockovich
Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Erin Brockovich: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Julia Roberts, David Brisbin, Dawn Didawick, Albert Finney. An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0195685/","name":"Erin Brockovich","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA1NWRkNTktNDMxNS00NjE4LWEzMDAtNzA3YzlhYzRhNDA4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0195685/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"styrrell"},"dateCreated":"2001-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Truth IS Stranger Than Fiction","reviewBody":"If I didn't know it was based on a "true" story I might have dismissed this movie as "unrealistic", particularly in the first half hour or so when it started off like another Julia Roberts comedy. At the beginning the film appears to focus primarily on her wardrobe, her foul language, and the developing romance with the "boy next door", whom she initially dislikes. As it turns out, the actual story, according to the bonus features on the DVD was even more melodramatic than the film's. The real Erin actually got sick to the point of hospitalization from the chromium in Hinkley. The director wisely decided to cut out this part of the story, to avoid making her too much of a martyr. Another aspect while not totally ignored (she does mention at least once that she's a "slow reader") but underplayed is Erin's dyslexia. This makes her accomplishments all the more amazing! Personally, I think this fact could have been emphasized more, as no doubt it was a big factor behind her "attitude" problems - her combativeness toward people with more education than herself, her struggles in finding a job, perhaps even in her efforts to accentuate her physical attractiveness through her outrageous clothing. All in all I found it an enjoyable and enlightening story - the triumph of a unique individual whose determination, empathy, and sense of moral duty ultimately outweigh her abrasiveness and lack of social graces. And largely why she triumphs is her partnership with an intelligent and decent lawyer in Ed Masry. What a refreshing departure from the usual Hollywood stereotype! On many occasions, he effectively counters Erin's prejudices with rational explanations how and why the legal system works the way it does, and why lawyers behave the way they do. With her passion and his reason, they make a great team. Now if only the movie hadn't fallen into the old Hollywood trap of giving its leading lady more outfits than is realistic for someone of her economic status. The point that Erin dressed provocatively and this caused problems with her co-workers could have easily been made with just 3 or 4 costumes. Other than that, it was a good movie - great performances and a wonderful story."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188174,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-03-17","keywords":"environmental issue,contamination,corporate crime,single mother,contaminated water","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi440712729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTRhNjI2NjEtZTdhMi00ZDkxLWI4MjYtMWU2ODU0MzExMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTRhNjI2NjEtZTdhMi00ZDkxLWI4MjYtMWU2ODU0MzExMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0109773/","name":"David Brisbin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010434/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0335666/","name":"Susannah Grant"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

Nestaje ključni član tajne vladine agencije pa ga cinični detektiv Leroy i genijalac Max koji vjeruje u paranormalno moraju pronaći dok otkrivaju moguću izvanzemaljsku aktivnost i "neobjašnjene" paranormalne događaje u Los Angelesu.

programme.title: Elektra
Elektra
programme.desc:
Elektra: Directed by Rob Bowman. With Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Kirsten Zien, Will Yun Lee. Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0357277/","name":"Elektra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI3MTUwNzM5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzczMDIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0357277/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RenX99"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"not the Electra I know...","reviewBody":"Perhaps I'm out of date or just don't know what Electra is like in current publications... But the Electra that I read was far more manipulative and always seems to have a plan. She usually used others to do her dirty work and more often than not some sort of double cross was involved. Just when you think you have it all figured out she pull the wool over your eyes and gets her way.

This movie was fairly weak on the dialog, the acting wasn't particularly convincing, and the action was spotty. I was really looking for something more along the lines of Frank Miller's book "Electra Assassin." Which is much darker than anything in this movie.

Special effect where cool, action was interesting at times, but more often than not the story and plot was slow or illogical. Tha Hand was not menacing enough, and Electra was not..... bitchy enough. programme.title: Cars 2
Auti 2
programme.desc:
Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace.

programme.title: Bee Movie
Pčelin film
programme.desc: Bee Movie: Directed by Simon J. Smith, Steve Hickner. With Jerry Seinfeld, Renée Zellweger, Matthew Broderick, Patrick Warburton. Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0389790/","name":"Bee Movie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1MDYxOTA4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE0MDUzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blo","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0389790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patriciogl10"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not the best animated movie you'll see, but certainly a pleasant one.","reviewBody":"Sometimes we waste time trying to compare certain movies with other similar ones when it comes to genre or plot. Bee Movie stands as a decent effort that slowly tries to entice us into its colorful animated world. The story deals with a recently graduated bee named Barry (voiced by Jerry Seinfeld) that begins to feel that there's more to life than working his butt off just to fabricate honey. So he decides to train with the Pollen Jocks whose job is to collect pollen from flowers outside the hive. That's how he gets out to the real world, and after a series of jiggling and accidental events, he is saved by Vanessa (voiced by Renée Zellweger) just as her boyfriend was about to squash him. Barry breaks an extremely important rule of bees: never speak to humans. But he does so knowingly just to thank Vanessa for saving his life. After they get to know each other, Barry finds out and immediately reacts outrageously to the fact that humans eat the very same honey that all the bees in the world work exhaustingly to make, just for the humans to make a profit out of it. This leads to a series of events that result in a catastrophic environmental outcome and it becomes Barry's mission to put it back the way it ought to be.\n\nI'm a big Seinfeld fan, but I gotta say, hearing Jerry's voice coming from an animated bee is something of a bizarre experience, as I didn't think his voice really fit the character, and this off-putting perception made the viewing experience a bit distracting. Seinfeld's voice holds a mature, adult sounding quality to it that it seems inadequate for a young bee fresh out of school. Apart from that, there were some clever jokes and bits like the appearance of Ray Liotta to name one and some obvious ones that should have gone unnoticed for their own sake. Overall I think that is an enjoyable way to spend an hour and a half; just immerse youself in the story and try to relate to it, for I'm sure that one of us has felt the way Barry does: unsure about what the future holds concerning job prospects, and worried that it might be the same life day in day out for the rest of your repeated days.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":152397,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-12-12","keywords":"jazz,larry king character,honey,surrealism,exploitation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bee Movie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi347210009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MjY3MTA4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzM4NDQ4._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MjY3MTA4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzM4NDQ4._V1_.jpg","description":"Bee Movie Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000632/","name":"Jerry Seinfeld"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000111/","name":"Matthew Broderick"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0971239/","name":"Simon J. Apart from that, there were some clever jokes and bits like the appearance of Ray Liotta to name one and some obvious ones that should have gone unnoticed for their own sake. Overall I think that is an enjoyable way to spend an hour and a half; just immerse youself in the story and try to relate to it, for I'm sure that one of us has felt the way Barry does: unsure about what the future holds concerning job prospects, and worried that it might be the same life day in day out for the rest of your repeated days.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":152397,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-12-12","keywords":"jazz,larry king character,honey,surrealism,exploitation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bee Movie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi347210009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MjY3MTA4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzM4NDQ4._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MjY3MTA4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzM4NDQ4._V1_.jpg","description":"Bee Movie Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000632/","name":"Jerry Seinfeld","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000111/","name":"Matthew Broderick"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0971239/","name":"Simon J. But there was, at least, reference to the charaiucter, saying she was in Bora Bora.

Contrary to other remarks here, I think Bindi did a fine job. In fact, I thought she was better than the Nim actress in the original movie.

This had a fun storyline and beautiful scenery. programme.title: Bedazzled
Začaran
programme.desc:
Bedazzled: Directed by Harold Ramis. With Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O'Connor, Miriam Shor. Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0230030/","name":"Bedazzled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgxOTg5OGUtOWViMC00NjM5LWEyMTQtN2M4NTBjYWUzOWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0230030/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TuckMN"},"dateCreated":"2000-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":""It's not easy being the Barbra Streisand of evil."","reviewBody":"Even though Elizabeth Hurley plays The Devil she is a goddess.

Brendan Fraser is certainly adequate to the job of playing Elliot Richards but Ms. Hurley steals the film.

She is perfectly cast as the `Princess of Darkness' and seems to truly enjoy exposing her darker side.

Brendan Fraser turns in a real acting tour d'force playing eight different characters. Possibly because of all the widely divergent characters he is playing he is not truly great in any of them  though he is hysterically funny  due primarily to the superb script by Larry Gelbart (of television's M*A*S*H fame), Harold Ramis (who also directed) and Peter Tolan from the original screen play by Peter Cook and Dudley Moore.

The Devil's demons (which appear in nearly every scene in one form or another) are great supporting roles played by Orlando Jones, Paul Adelstein and Toby Huss. They provide just the right touch of devilish humour, charm and wit. Another bit of casting genius and writing is Gabriel Casseus as Elliot's cellmate who expounds on the soul and is later seen playing chess with The Devil (who cheats, of course).

In fact all of the supporting characters were perfectly cast and brilliantly executed.

The script was so tight and well written that it was almost actor-proof. It was even able to carry a moral message without slamming the audience in the head with it.

To paraphrase an idea from the film you get out of life [and this film] what you put into it.

This was an all-around good film with good direction, good jokes, good acting, excellent make-up (especially on Brendan Fraser by Ben Nye, Jr.) and a good yet unobtrusive score. I recommend it highly.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-31","keywords":"gay,john wilkes booth character,soul,devil,dream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bedazzled","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2293825817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NjNDI0NTItNjQxYi00YTk2LWFhZTgtODc2YTg4YmY3YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NjNDI0NTItNjQxYi00YTk2LWFhZTgtODc2YTg4YmY3YjAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000409/","name":"Brendan Fraser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000167/","name":"Elizabeth Hurley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0640323/","name":"Frances O'Connor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017013/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177228/","name":"Peter Cook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001545/","name":"Dudley Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312205/","name":"Larry Gelbart"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Dnevnik Bridget Jones
programme.desc:
Bridget Jones's Diary: Directed by Sharon Maguire. With Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Celia Imrie, James Faulkner. Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243155/","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc3NjU1ZTEtNmNjNi00YzNiLWI3OWQtMTJmYTRkZDc1NDE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0243155/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kwongers"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delightful, witty, and sexy  a TRIUMPH!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of the books, I had incredibly high expectations of the movie. In order for the movie to work for me, it had to capture Bridget's plucky-heroine character and the hilarious-poignant emotions that are in the book. Needless to say, `Bridget Jones's Diary' the movie worked very, very, very well. Although Helen Fielding also wrote the screenplay (w/ Richard Curtis, very skilled with romantic comedies) and keeps the laughs coming, this movie could have fallen flat on its face. But it doesn't because one, the casting is absolutely divine and two, smartly builds on some elements the book downplays. 

	 Renee Zellweger is absolutely perfect as Bridget Jones. She has always been one of my favorite actresses and here, she totally displays Bridget's pathetic cuteness. Zellweger gained weight for this role, too, so she looks adorably plump. It's very, very hard to not fall in love with her the moment you see her at her family's Christmas party or drinking alone at home or listening to sad, Celine Dion music. (You have a heart of stone if you aren't moved to laughs or tears or pity for her.) I can't imagine anyone else playing Bridget Jones. Zellweger fits the role because she is very much normal and approachable we can relate to her. 

As Daniel Cleaver (her caddish Cassanova lover/boss), Hugh Grant is smoldering and hilarious. (Ok, I might be a little biased because I've been in love with him for ages and ages, but you can't deny he is a great comedic actor.) There's no trace of his stuttering that we saw (and I loved) in `Four Weddings and a Funeral' or `Sense and Sensibility.' Grant morphs effortlessly into a cad that we all love to hate and all love to love. Yes, it's a paradox, but that is what Grant brings to his role. He makes being `bad' look so sexy. You can't take your eyes off him; he brings his own humor to his role. It's lovely, smoldering, and incredibly sexy. 

 Colin Firth is also a delight to watch onscreen as Mark Darcy (I think I might be in love with him, too). He is also sexy and smoldering, but not in the same wild, fiery way as Daniel Cleaver. Firth brings a very cute sweetness to his role. I don't know if it is his adorable face or his hair or the way he dresses or just the fact that he is a major sex symbol, but you can't help but fall in love with him the MOMENT you see him onscreen. There is also one very beautiful moment where he tells Bridget, `I like you very much just the way you are.' It's incredibly romantic and, for me, ranks right up there with Tom Cruise's `You complete me' in `Jerry Maguire.' He also has rather explosive chemistry with Renee Zellweger, which is moving and sexy all at the same time. (And, of course, the author Helen Fielding used Colin Firth as the basis for Mark Darcy, so it all works out marvelously.) 	

I also mentioned that the movie smartly builds on some elements that the book downplays. Yes, there are certain parts of the movie that cannot be found in the book, but I'm still glad they put them in the movie. Most of what they added doesn't necessarily build on plot but it does add to the characters. I don't want to give anything away because it's rather hilarious what unfolds onscreen. The movie is filmed in an almost Ally McBeal type of way but it remains true to the sincerity, cuteness, and pathetic naivete that Bridget Jones embodies. There are no pretensions. It's an entirely wonderful film. 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":235706,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-10","keywords":"unfaithfulness,employer employee relationship,opposites attract,love triangle,book publishing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi192783897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bridget Jones's Diary"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000424/","name":"Hugh Grant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536632/","name":"Sharon Maguire"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276144/","name":"Helen Fielding"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0203577/","name":"Andrew Davies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193485/","name":"Richard Curtis"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0243155, Title: Bridget Jones's Diary, --- Description: Bridget Jones's Diary: Directed by Sharon Maguire. With Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Celia Imrie, James Faulkner. Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243155/","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc3NjU1ZTEtNmNjNi00YzNiLWI3OWQtMTJmYTRkZDc1NDE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0243155/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kwongers","dateCreated":"2004-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delightful, witty, and sexy  a TRIUMPH!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of the books, I had incredibly high expectations of the movie. In order for the movie to work for me, it had to capture Bridget's plucky-heroine character and the hilarious-poignant emotions that are in the book. Needless to say, `Bridget Jones's Diary' the movie worked very, very, very well. Although Helen Fielding also wrote the screenplay (w/ Richard Curtis, very skilled with romantic comedies) and keeps the laughs coming, this movie could have fallen flat on its face. But it doesn't because one, the casting is absolutely divine and two, smartly builds on some elements the book downplays. 

	 Renee Zellweger is absolutely perfect as Bridget Jones. She has always been one of my favorite actresses and here, she totally displays Bridget's pathetic cuteness. Zellweger gained weight for this role, too, so she looks adorably plump. It's very, very hard to not fall in love with her the moment you see her at her family's Christmas party or drinking alone at home or listening to sad, Celine Dion music. (You have a heart of stone if you aren't moved to laughs or tears or pity for her.) I can't imagine anyone else playing Bridget Jones. Zellweger fits the role because she is very much normal and approachable we can relate to her. 

As Daniel Cleaver (her caddish Cassanova lover/boss), Hugh Grant is smoldering and hilarious. (Ok, I might be a little biased because I've been in love with him for ages and ages, but you can't deny he is a great comedic actor.) There's no trace of his stuttering that we saw (and I loved) in `Four Weddings and a Funeral' or `Sense and Sensibility.' Grant morphs effortlessly into a cad that we all love to hate and all love to love. Yes, it's a paradox, but that is what Grant brings to his role. He makes being `bad' look so sexy. You can't take your eyes off him; he brings his own humor to his role. It's lovely, smoldering, and incredibly sexy. 

 Colin Firth is also a delight to watch onscreen as Mark Darcy (I think I might be in love with him, too). He is also sexy and smoldering, but not in the same wild, fiery way as Daniel Cleaver. Firth brings a very cute sweetness to his role. I don't know if it is his adorable face or his hair or the way he dresses or just the fact that he is a major sex symbol, but you can't help but fall in love with him the MOMENT you see him onscreen. There is also one very beautiful moment where he tells Bridget, `I like you very much just the way you are.' It's incredibly romantic and, for me, ranks right up there with Tom Cruise's `You complete me' in `Jerry Maguire.' He also has rather explosive chemistry with Renee Zellweger, which is moving and sexy all at the same time. (And, of course, the author Helen Fielding used Colin Firth as the basis for Mark Darcy, so it all works out marvelously.) 	

I also mentioned that the movie smartly builds on some elements that the book downplays. Yes, there are certain parts of the movie that cannot be found in the book, but I'm still glad they put them in the movie. Most of what they added doesn't necessarily build on plot but it does add to the characters. I don't want to give anything away because it's rather hilarious what unfolds onscreen. The movie is filmed in an almost Ally McBeal type of way but it remains true to the sincerity, cuteness, and pathetic naivete that Bridget Jones embodies. There are no pretensions. It's an entirely wonderful film. 10/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":235706,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-10","keywords":"unfaithfulness,employer employee relationship,opposites attract,love triangle,book publishing","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi192783897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bridget Jones's Diary","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000424/","name":"Hugh Grant"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536632/","name":"Sharon Maguire"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276144/","name":"Helen Fielding","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0203577/","name":"Andrew Davies","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193485/","name":"Richard Curtis"],"duration":"PT1H37M"</script><metacontent="

Chevy Chase returns in the third installment of the Vacation series as Clarke W. Griswold as he tries desperately to maintain his sanity during the holidays with all of his relatives coming to stay under his roof and enduring all the mishaps along the way.

This is the funniest film in the series plain and simple. Chevy Chase has never been better. Christmas Vacation is filled with countless jokes and gags that it's impossible not to laugh.

programme.title: Sulm i papritur
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren, Vinnie Jones, Randy Couture. Ndërkohë që agjent special e DEA, përgatitet për të arrestuar një bos të drogës, një polic i korruptuar është i gatshëm të luftojë si të mundet për të vazhduar jetën e tij të dyfishtë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: 1847-ta e zezë
programme.desc: Irlandë, 1847. Kur Zia e Madhe e Bukës shkatërron familjen dhe vendlindjen e tij, një ushtar irlandez që luftonte për Perandorinë Britanike, dezerton ushtrinë dhe kërkon hakmarrje ndaj tiranëve përgjegjës.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë

programme.title: Osirisi:Planet i 9-të
programme.desc: Në një të ardhme kur kolonozimi njerëzor është zgjeruar në planete të tjera, një ushtarak në garë me kohën do të bëjë një aleancë të pazakontë për të shpëtuar vajzën e tij dhe vetë njërëzimin, nga një virus vdekjeprurës.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Pranë armikut
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme. Thellë në kufirin Kanada - ShBA, dy armiq të betuar duhet të bashkojnë forcat për t'i shpëtuar një bande të pamëshirshme, të cilët po kërkojnë ngarkesën e drogës që është zhdukur pranë asaj zone.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Forca e veprimit
programme.desc: Steven Steven Seagal,Darren Shahlavi.Elijah Kane ivihet pas një njeriu, i cili ka ardhur në qytet për të mbrojtur armikun numër 1 të tij. Përmes tij, ai mund të kapë objektivin dhe t'i japë fund dhunës njëherë e përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Plumbi i vrasësit
programme.desc: Christian Slater, Donald Sutherland, Elika Portnoy. Dikush po zhduk një e nga një terroristët me prioritet të lartë të qeverisë amerikane dhe ish agjenti i F.B.I-së, Robert Diggs, ngarkohet me misionin e vështirë të zbulimit të së vërtetës.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Harresë
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman. Në të ardhmen, kur Toka është shkatërruar nga nje racë jashtëtokësorësh, Xhek Harper - veteran i ngarkuar me misionin e nxjerrjes së burimeve të mbetura nga toka, fillon të dyshojë për misionin dhe veten e tij.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Renegatët e Beitaunit
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton, Eva Longoria. Tre vëllezër famëkeq nga Alabama më në fund vendosin të kryejnë një vepër të mirë, por do t'i hapin vetes shumë telashe me policë të korruptuar e gangsterë të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Rojtari Vetmitar
programme.desc: Johnny Depp. Tonto, një indian i Amerikës ritregon historitë e panjohura, qe e shndërruan Xhon Ridin, nga një njeri i ligjit në një legjendë të drejtësisë. Dy e heronjtë, duhet të bashkojnë forcat në luftë kundër korrupsionit...
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
western

programme.title: Ushtarët e fatit
programme.desc: Christian Slater, Sean Bean, Ving Rhames. Një ish ushtar i forcave speciale, duhet të mbrojë disa njerëz të pasur, të cilët paguajnë shuma marramendëse për të përjetuar misione ushtarake.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lirimi i pengjeve
programme.desc: Tyrese Gibson, John Malkovich. Të armatosur deri në grykë dhe me një plan të mirëmenduar pengmarrjeje, një grup mercenarësh nisin hakmarrjen ndaj një kongresmeni amerikan. Por ata nuk e dinë që mes të pengjeve ndodhet një ish marins, i cili nuk do të ndal.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kredoja e Vrasësve
programme.desc: 2016. Michael Fassbender. Bazuar në një nga videolojërat më të suksesshme! Kur Kalum Linç, eksploron kujtimet e paraardhësit të tij Agilar, ai kthehet në një vrasës të pakrahasueshëm dhe zbulon se është pasardhës i një shoqërie sekrete Vrasësish.
programme.category: Aksion

fantazi

programme.title: Emri i koduar: Nëntori
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan, Olga Kuryolenko. Një ish agjent i CIA-s thirret per një mision personal ku e gjen veten përballë ish nxënësit, të dy pjesë e një loje ku janë përfshirë zyrtarë të lartë të CIA-s dhe presidenti i Rusisë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Gara e vdekjes 2
programme.desc: Luke Goss, Lauren Cohan. Kjo është historia e zanafillës se garës më vdekjeprurëse, në burgun më famëkeq të botës. Rregulli është vetëm një... fiton i mbijetuari i fundit dhe çmimi është liria.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Snajper 3
programme.desc: Qitesit Nr.1 te Marines Amerikane tani i duhet te perballet me nje armik te paparashikuar, shokun e tij te ngushte, i cili mendohej se ish vrare gjate luftimeve, por ne fakt kishte vazhduar aktivitetin e tij ne fshehtesi.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Sangala-24 Redemption
programme.desc: 2008. K.Sutherland. Kronika e një dite nga jeta e agjentit federal Jack Bauer i cili kësaj here ndodhet në Afrikë. Ai ka lënë gjithçka prapa krahëve dhe po përpiqet të marrë veten e të rrojë në paqe... por paqja e tij s'do të zgjasë shumë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Kodi i zi-Presidenti në rrezik
programme.desc: Ray Liotta, Dominic Purcell. Në përpjekje për të eliminuar presidentin e Amerikës, katër vrasës profesionistë pretendojnë se janë agjentë sekretë dhe shpresa e vetme për ta shpëtuar është një ish marins.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Hakmarrja ime
programme.desc: Steven Seagal. Pas një sulmi të pamëshirshëm, përveç Elijah Kane është i vetmi që mbijeton dhe gjithë anëtarët e skuadrës eliminohen. Me një skuadër të re specialistësh, ai do të kërkojë me çdo kusht të hakmarret mbi përgjegjësin...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Grabitja e Nju Jorkut
programme.desc: Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë! Nje roje sigurie (Liam Hemsworth) dhe miku i tij i fëmijërisë Pal (Michael Angarano) bëjë plane për të vjedhur një makinë të blinduar...
programme.category: Aksion
dramë

programme.title: Loja e Enderit
programme.desc: Asa Butterfield, Abigail Breslin. Kur një race jashtëtokësore sulmon Tokën, folta ndërkombëtare e galaksisë përgatitet për sulmin e radhës duke rekrutuar fëmijët më inteligjentë dhe duke i stërvitur për të drejtuar betejën e pashmangshme...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Turpi
programme.desc: John Malkovich, Jessica Haines. Pas një lidhjeje seksuale me një studente, një profesor në Afrikën e Jugut, shkon të gjejë paqe në fermën e vajzës së tij, por do të përballet me trazirat dhe pasojat që erdhën pas periudhës së Aparteidit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Punonjësi i stacionit
programme.desc: Fitues i çmimit Bafta dhe 25 çmimeve të tjera. Pas vdekjes së shokut të vetëm, një njeri i lindur me nanizëm, zhvendoset në një stacion treni për të jetuar i vetmuar, por aty njihet me një artiste me probleme dhe një shitës miqësor.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Grushti i jetës
programme.desc: 2015. Jake Gyllenhaal. I përballur me një tragjedi, kampioni i boksit Billi Houp, rrezikon të humbasë gjithçka, madje edhe kujdestarinë e vajzës. I vendosur për të rivënë në vijë jetën e tij, ai kërkon ndihmën e një trajneri të vjetër.
programme.category: Sport
dramë

programme.title: Gruaja e tretë
programme.desc: 2018. Në Vietnamin rural të shekullit të 19-të, 14-vjeçarja Mej bëhet gruaja e tretë e një burri të pasur. Tek rritet në një familje me tradita mizore, dëshirat e saj të fshehura do ta detyrojnë të zgjedhë mes të jetuarit në siguri apo të qenit e lir.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Pas jetës ka më shumë
programme.desc: Robin Williams, Annabella Sciorra, Cuba Gooding Jr. Film fitues i çmimit Oskar dhe 4 çmimeve të tjera kinematografike. Pasi vdes në një aksident me makinë, një njeri braktis parajsën dhe niset në kërkim të gruas së tij, e cila vrau veten.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Në kërkim të folesë
programme.desc: John Krasinski, Maya Rudolph. Aventura e një çifti që mbas shumë vitesh, vendosin të kenë një fëmijë dhe vihen në kërkim për të gjetur vendin e duhur për ta rritur...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Pak kohë për dashuri
programme.desc: Mia Wasikowska, Henry Hopper. Një i ri, që si për çudi ka pasion pjesëmarrjen në funerale dhe flet me fantazmën e një piloti japonez, bie në dashuri me një adoleshente, e cila e do shumë jetën por nuk ka shumë kohë për të jetuar...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Katër pendët
programme.desc: Heath Ledger, Wes Bentley, Kate Hudson. Në Sudanin e vitit 1884, një oficer britanik, jep dorëheqejen në prag të një beteje dhe pa i ditur arsyet e vërteta, miqtë dhe e dashura i japin katër pendë, simbol i tradhëtisë dhe frikës.
programme.category: Dramë romantike
luftë

programme.title: Akademiku
programme.desc: J.McAvoy. Brian studion ne Universitetin e Bristolit. Duket se endrra e jetës së tij është bërë realitet: ai po studion në një universitet pasanikesh. Tani ka 2 sfida për të fituar: konkursin 'University Chalenge; dhe zemrën e Alice.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Letra për Xhulietën
programme.desc: Amanda Seyfried, Gael García Bernal, Vanessa Redgrave. Në qytetin ku Romeo takoi Xhulietën, një turiste amerikane gjen një letër dashurie të humbur ndër vite dhe përpiqet të ribashkojë autorin e letrës me gruan për të cilën ai e shkroi.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Partneri ideal
programme.desc: Diane Lane, John Cusack. Sara ka 8 muaj që ka dalë nga një martesë e dështuar. Motrat e miqtë s'e lënë rehat dhe e nxisin të takojë kandidatë. A do ta gjejë ajo shpirtin binjak, por me kusht që ai t'i dojë qentë?
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Surpriza e dashurisë
programme.desc: Një sipërmarrëse e re mendon se ka gjetur burrin e përkryer, por prindërit e saj kërkues nuk e miratojnë. Kur asaj i kthehen ndjenjat për ish të dashurin e gjimnazit, i cili s'ka asnjë arritje në jetë, ata përpiqen ta bindin vajzën e tyre të kthehet tek i.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Nën diellin e Toskanës
programme.desc: Diane Lane, Raoul Bova. Pas një divorci të dhimbshëm, një grua shkon me pushime në Toskanë dhe në një vendim të momentit blen një vilë të vjetër. Një vendim që do ta njohë me shumë njerëz dhe do t'i ndryshojë përgjithmonë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Romantikët e rinj
programme.desc: E lodhur nga mungesa e djemve kavalierë të moshës së saj, një studente e gazetarisë në prag të diplomimit, heq dorë nga lidhjet për dashuri dhe vendos të bëhet e dashura e një burri të pasur dhe më të madh në moshë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Historia e Erni Dejvis
programme.desc: Rob Brown, Dennis Quaid. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë dhe të jashtëzakonshme të Erni Dejvis, i cili në një kohë përçarjesh shoqërore, u bë lojtari i parë me ngjyrë që fitoi çmimin më prestigjoz në futbollin amerikan të universiteteve.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: Hesheri
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Devin Brochu, Natalie Portman. Një i ri antisocial dhe problematik, trazon jetët e një adoleshenti dhe babait të tij, të cilët thuajse nuk flasin fare me njëri-tjetrin, që pas vdekjes së nënës së adoleshentit...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shteti i lirë Xhons
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey. Fymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta! Gjatë luftës civile në Amerikë, fermeri Njuton Najt, vihet në krye të një force rebele me fermerë e skllevër për të krijuar një shtet fare të vogël brenda Konfederatës.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Jeta si shtëpi
programme.desc: Kevin Kline, Kristin S. Thomas, Hayden Christensen. I diagnostikuar me një sëmundje të rëndë, një arkitekt vendos të riparojë një shtëpi të vjetër, me shpresën që njëkohësisht të riparojë edhe marrëdhënien me djalin, e ish bashkëshorten.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Përshëndetje, mirupafshim
programme.desc: Melanie Lynskey, Blythe Danner. E ardhmja e Emit nuk duket premtuese kur bashkëshorti e tradhton dhe pas divorcit, detyrohet të jetojë me prindërit. Por, një lidhje romantike sekrete me një 19-vjeçar, do t'ia shtojë pasionin për jetën.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Ruaje vallezimin e fundit
programme.desc: Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas. Sarah, e braktisi ëndrrën për tu bërë balerinë, kur nëna e saj vdiq aksidentalisht. Por takimi i rastësishëm me një të ri me ngjyrë, hap para saj botën e magjishme të kërcimit të rrugës.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Rrjeti social
programme.desc: Jesse Eisenberg, Justin Timberlake. Historia e vërtetë e Mark Zuckerberg, krijuesit të 'Facebook'. Fillimet e krijimit të perandorisë së tij miliarda dollarëshe dhe betejat ligjore që erdhën bashkë me suksesin e tij të jashtëzakonshëm.
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Maria Madalena
programme.desc: Rooney Mara, Joaquin Phoenix. Një grua e re braktis fshatin dhe familjen e saj tradicionale për t'iu bashkuar një lëvizjeje të re sociale. Në krye të saj është një lider karizmatik, Jezusi i Nazaretit, i cili premton të ndryshojë botën.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ithtaria
programme.desc: 2017. Një film nga Maggie Betts. Në fillimin e viteve 1960, gjatë periudhës së Vatikanit II, një vajzë e re në rrugëtimin për t'u bërë murgeshë e ka të vështirë të përballet me besimin, ndryshimet e kishës dhe seksualitetin e saj.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: Hilary Swank. Jeta përsosur e një agjenti sportiv të martuar, shkatërrohet kur zbulon se gruaja seksi dhe misterioze me të cilën kaloi një natë pasionante, është një detektive këmbëngulëse që e ngatërron atë në hetimin e saj të fundit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Gëzuar Ditën e Vdekjes
programme.desc: Një studente fillon të ripërjetojë ditën e vrasjes së saj, dhe e vetmja mënyrë për të ndalur horrorin është të zbulojë identitetin e vrasësit.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Pas cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni xhirimet e prapaskenave te filmit.
programme.category: Shooter

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: 2017. Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart. Në të ardhmen e afërt, Logan i lodhur nga vite luftimesh e arratie, kujdeset për profesorin X në fshehtësi. Por bota e tyre kthehet përmbys kur një vajzë e re mutante kërkon ndihmën e tyre për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Lumturia më bën keq
programme.desc: Martin Freeman. Çarli vuan nga një sëmundje që i shkakton gjendje të fikti sa herë përjeton emocione të forta, në veçanti lumturi. Ai i ka mësuar vetes të refuzojë çdo gjë që i jep kënaqësi, por gjithçka sprovohet kur bie në dashuri...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Biznes Zonjash

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dhoma e arratisjes
programme.desc: Gjashtë të panjohur joshen të marrin pjesë në lojën 'Dhoma e arratisjes', por e gjejnë veten në situata përtej kontrollit të tyre. Ata duhet të përdorin zgjuarsinë për të zgjidhur të dhënat e lojës, në të kundërt do të vdesin.
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Labirinti 3: Kura e vdekjes
programme.desc: Në përmbyllje të sagës, Tomas udhëheq grupin e tij drejt misionit final. Për të shpëtuar miqtë e tyre, ata duhet të gjejnë një mënyrë që të hyjnë në labirintin legjendar 'Qyteti i fundit', më i rrezikshmi nga të gjithë larbirintët!
programme.category: Fantashkence
Aksion

programme.title: Një jetë tjetër
programme.desc: Me Enrico Brignano dhe Ilaria Spada. Një taksisti të pa kënaqur nga jeta, rastësisht i jepet mundësia të bëjë jetën luksoze, të një miliarderi me pushime.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mos merr frymë
programme.desc: Duke shpresuar se do të gjejnë shumë para, dy djem dhe një vajzë futennë shtëpinë e një njeriu të verbër, pa e ditur se ai nuk është aspak aq i paaftë sa duket...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Gjueti njerëzish
programme.desc: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Annabelle Wallis. Një ish gjahtar, i përndjekur nga zhdukja e mistershme e vajzës së tij, merr vesh se një vajzë e re që i ngjan të bijës vritet mizorisht, ndaj ai vendos të bëjë drejtësi për të...
programme.category: Aksion
krim
thriller

programme.title: Njeriu-Merimangë: Mbrëmja Studentore
programme.desc: Tom Holland, Robert Downey Jr.. Piter Parker, këtë herë përpiqet të balancojë jetën në shkollë me sekretin e tij si Njeriu-Merimangë dhe njëkohësisht duhet të përballet me një rrezik të ri që kërcënon Nju Jorkun.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Natë e keqe në El Royale
programme.desc: J. Bridges, D. Johnson, Ch. Hemsworth. Shtatë të panjohur, secili me një sekret për të fshehur, takohen në 'El Royale', një hotel në rrënim, me të kaluarën e errët. Gjatë natës fatale, secilit do t'i jepet shansi i fundit për shpagim...
programme.category: Thriller
Mister

programme.title: Një superskuadër
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit: 2001. Pesë policë, që kalojnë ditët duke shtyrë kohën, mësojnë se departamenti do mbyllet pasi krimi pothuaj nuk ekziston. Por, një sasi e gjetur droge dhe një trup i pajetë do ndryshojnë situatën.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mbrëmjen e kaluar
programme.desc: Kevin Hart, Michael Ealy, Regina Hall, Joy Bryant. Kjo është kronologjia e marrëdhënieve te dy çifteve, nga bari deri tek dhoma e gjumit. Shumë shpejt këto marrëdhënie do të vihen në provë në botën e vërtetë.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Frakia kundër Drakulës
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, Edmund Purdom, Ania Pieroni. Frakia, agjent shitjesh ka tre ditë kohë të mbyllë një marrëveshje, përndryshe pushohet nga puna. Mundësia e vetme është një kështjellë në Transilvani, pronë e kontit famëkeq Drakula...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Një polic ne Beverly Hills III
programme.desc: Dedektivi me zbavites i te gjitha koherave, perseri ne Beverli Hills, i thirrur nga koleget e tij. Behet pjese e argetimeve dhe rreziqeve me te medha te parkut te Lojerave Wonderland ku vendos te vihet ne ndjekje te keqberesve.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: Kontrolli prindëror
programme.desc: Billy Crystal, Bette Midler. Një burrë dhe bashkëshortja e tij, pranojnë të kujdesen për dy nipërit dhe mbesën. Por shumë shpejt sjellja me fëmijët, bie ndesh me metodat 'moderne' të edukimit nga prindërit e tyre.
programme.category: Komedi familjare

programme.title: Riprodhuesi i filmave
programme.desc: Jack Black. Majku zbulon se të gjitha kasetat që merr me qera shoku i tij Xherri, janë çmagnetizuar. Për të mos e humbur vendin e punes, Xherri propozon të xhirojne ata vetë një version të ri të filmave te prishur.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të papriturat e jetës
programme.desc: Raoul Bova, Barbora Bobulova, Martina Stella. Pasi detyrohet të transferohet nga Londra në Milano dhe të ndahet nga e dashura, një njeri njihet me 4 femra që do t'i sjellin shumë të papritura...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Fqinjët spiunë
programme.desc: Zach Galifianakis, Isla Fisher. Një çift me një jetë të qetë, zbulon se fqinjët e tyre në dukje perfekt janë spiunë ndërkombëtarë dhe shumë shpejt të katërt e gjejnë veten në mes të një komploti të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Udhëtim me një rok star
programme.desc: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand. Një asistent i ri i një kompanie muzikore dërgohet në Londër, për të bindur një legjendë roku të shthurur, që të japë koncert në Los Anxhelos...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Shkëmbimi
programme.desc: Jennifer Aniston, Jason Bateman. Një grua beqare, vendos të bëhet nënë përmes një dhuruesi. Por në ditën e madhe, ndodh një shkëmbim që s'kuptohet derisa ajo rikthehet në qytet pas 7 vitesh...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Policë në rezervë
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg, Will Ferrell. Teri dhe Allen, dy 'policë në rezervë' bien në gjurmët e një krimineli shumë të rrezikshëm. Që nga ky çast fama për ta është vetëm një hap larg, mbetet veç zgjidhja e çështjes...
programme.category: Komedi
aksion

programme.title: Terapi me dashuri
programme.desc: Queen Latifah, Common. Një terapiste fizike, e cila gjithmonë ka vepruar sipas mënyrës së saj, fillon të rehabilitojë një basketbollist të dëmtuar dhe marrëdhënia e tyre sa vjen e bëhet më personale.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Teoria e derrit
programme.desc: Loren është një blogere që inkurajon komunitetin femëror të zbatojë "Teorinë e derrit": Të ndahen nga të dashurit brenda 6 muajve, sepse aq zgjat besnikëria e burrave. Por dikush sfidon teorinë e saj me një garë tunduese...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Shtëpia e babait
programme.desc: 2017. Kur babi i tyre, zgjohet pas 5 vjetsh nga koma, të tronditur, 4 fëmijët e tij, nuk gjejnë dot mënyrën për ti thënë, se e kanë lënë pa shtëpi. Një komedi për të mos u humbur.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ylli afgan
programme.desc: Bill Murray. Në Afganistan, pa para në xhep dhe i braktisur nga klientja e fundit, një menaxher muzike zbulon një adoleshente me një ze të mahnitshëm dhe bën të pamundurën që ajo të marrë pjesë në programin e talentit 'Ylli Afgan'.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson. Derek Zoolander, fotomodeli i famshëm, fitues për 3 vjet me radhë i çmimit prestigjioz 'Modeli Mashkull i Vitit'... tani ka një rival, por është gati të bëjë 'çdo gje' që karriera e tij të mos mbarojë!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean, katastrofa e fundit
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson. Një njeri. Një kryevepër pikture. Një gabim trashanik. Mjeshtri i katastrofës vjen me historinë më komike e tragjike në të njejtën kohë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Familje agjentësh
programme.desc: K.Turner, D.Quaid. Ata dikur punonin si agjente sekrete, tani gjenden me pushime në Nju Orlins me vajzën e tyre 9 muajshme, por e kaluara vazhdon t'i ndjekë nga pas. Një familje që mund t'i shpëtojë gjithçkaje...përveç punës së tyre.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Fantoci del në pension
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio. Pas shumë vitesh si punëtor i palodhur, Fantocit i ka ardhur koha të dalë në pension. Por mërzia nuk e lë të qetë dhe ai është i vendosur të gjejë një pasion të ri edhe pse në çdo gjë që bën... dështon.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Shefja
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell. Nje pasanike kapet duke mashtruar dhe burgoset. Pasi del e përpiqet t'i bindë të gjithë se ka ndryshuar, ajo mendon një plan qesharak për të rindërtuar perandorinë me ndihmën e asistentes dhe vajzës së saj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Bodyguards: Truprojat
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo. Pasi pushohen nga puna për paaftësinë e tyre, tre policë vendosin të fillojnë punë si truproja. Por edhe në këtë profesion, telashet dhe keqkuptimet nuk do t'ju ndahen...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Në bordin e shtëpisë tonë
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn, Kurt Russell. Zonja e rëndë Grendstejtën gjithmonë e ka ditur atë që donte dhe arrinte ta merrte. Ajo kishte pushtet, shije, stil.. dhe...humbje të herëpashershme të kujtesës.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Lëmshi
programme.desc: Salvatore Ficarra, Valentino Picone. Dy kushërinj, ndahen në moshën 10 vjecare për shkak të zënkave të baballarëve (vëllezër mes tyre), deri ditën që pas shumë vitesh fati bën që ata të ritakohen.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Kërdia
programme.desc: Kur një virus që nxjerr në pah instiktet më të dhunshme tek njerëzit pushton godinën e një koorporate ligjore, një punonjës i pushuar padrejtësisht nga puna do të luftojë egërsisht kundër ish-kolegëve për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Grabitqari
programme.desc: I rekrutuar nga CIA për të shpëtuar disa pengje në Amerikën Qëndrore, Schwarzenegger dhe njerëzit e tij do të gjenden përballë një armiku të paimagjinueshëm, më të egër se kurrë, një krijesë jashtëtokësore.
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: As zombi, as njerëz
programme.desc: Pasi përhapjes së një virusi që kthen njerëzit në zombi, njerëzimi arrin të krijojë një vaksinë që bën rikthimin në gjendje normale. Kur kërkesa për vaksinë bëhet më e madhe se prodhimi, kaosi merr pushtetin mbi virusin.
programme.category: Thriller
horror

programme.title: Ana
programme.desc: Mark Strong, Taissa Farmiga. Një hetues që ka aftësinë të futet në mendjet e njerëzve, përpiqet të zbulojë nëse një adoleshente e trazuar është e aftë të vrasë apo viktimë e një traume.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Shenjat
programme.desc: Mel Gibson. Familja Hess jeton në Pennsylvani. Tek zgjohen një mengjes ata gjejne në oborrin pas shtepise një rreth me diameter mbi 150 metra. Ne emisionet informative ata do mesojne se rrathe te tille jane shfaqur ne tere boten.
programme.category: Mister

programme.title: Rrëmbimi i Z.Heineken
programme.desc: Jim Sturgess, Sam Worthington. Historia e vërtetë e pesë miqve, të cilët në vitin 1983, ia dolën të rrëmbenin pronarin e birrës Heineken dhe të merrnin shpërblimin më të madh në histori.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Misioni i gjenive
programme.desc: 2006. Një terrorist i marrë mbledh bashkë shtatë persona me koifiçent të lartë inteligjence dhe i detyron ata të zgjidhin brenda natës problemet që shqetësojnë botën. Në rast dështimi, ai do të shpërthejë një bombë në Uashington.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Të humbur nën diell
programme.desc: Josh Duhamel, Josh Wiggins. Një kriminel që po përpiqet t'i shmanget të kaluarës plot gabime, krijon një lidhje të fortë me një adoleshent jetim, të cilin do ta përdorë edhe si bashkëpunëtor në një seri vjedhjesh.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Furia
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage, Rachel Nichols, Max Ryan. Kur vajza e një ish-krimineli rrëmbehet, ai mbledh bashkëpunëtorët e vjetër dhe përpiqet ta vërë vetë në vend drejtësinë.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Çmendina Stonehearst
programme.desc: 2014. Kate Beckinsale, Jim Sturgess. Bazuar në tregimin e Edgar Allan Poe... Kur doktori i ri Eduard Nugeit, mbërrin në çmendinën Stonehearst, ai bën një zbulim të frikshëm që do ta çojë në limitet e ndërgjegjes së tij...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Unë jam hakmarrja
programme.desc: 2016. John Travolta. Pasi një grup policësh të korruptuar lënë të lire vrasësit e gruas së tij, një ish-agjent vendos ta çojë drejtësinë në vend! Por kërkimi për vrasësit do të zbulojë një konspiracion që shtrihet në rangjet e larta qeveritare.
programme.category: Thriller
aksion

programme.title: Djalli i vogël
programme.desc: 2017. Adam Scott. Geri, i cili sapo është martuar me gruan e ëndrrave të tij, fillon të dyshojë se djali i saj 5-vjeçar mund të jetë Antikrishti.
programme.category: Horror
komedi

programme.title: Horror në Amityville
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds. Bazuar në një histori të vërtete. Një çift i ri do të shpërngulet në shtëpinë ku një vit më parë gjashtë njerëz u vranë brutalisht. Pasoja do të jete...28 dite tmerri të paimagjinueshëm.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Seberg - kundër armiqve
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Anthony Mackie. Frymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta. Në vitet '60, jeta e ikonës së kinemasë dhe aktivistes, Jean Seberg, merr një kthesë të rrezikshme kur FBI e shënjestron për të diskredituar përfshirjen e saj në lëvizjen e të drejtave civ.
programme.category: Thriller politik

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra
Moj život s Liberaceom
programme.desc:
Behind the Candelabra: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Matt Damon, Scott Bakula, Eric Zuckerman, Eddie Jemison. A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1291580/","name":"Behind the Candelabra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0OTY2OTM0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTk4OTQ1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1291580/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sergeant_Tibbs"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally a film that suits Soderbergh's voyeuristic and clinical style.","reviewBody":"It's starting to look like 2013 is Soderbergh's year. Side Effects and Behind The Candelabra seem to be my favourite of his career so far, though that's only relatively, as I'm not a big fan of him. I do have Out Of Sight on my to see list coming up soon and I do need to give Traffic another watch before I make any final assessment on him. Although Soderbergh is frequently the director, cinematography and editor on his projects, he may be efficient but he's far too clinical, pushing the audience as an observer that it's difficult to feel emotionally involved in his films. I can't get excited for his half-baked premises that most likely haven't been fulfilled to their potential. However, Behind The Candelabra may be the first film I've seen of his that suits his style ideally. His style is still distant and voyeuristic, but in this bizarre world where Liberace adopts his lover for a son and pays for plastic surgery to make him look like himself, it feels more deliberate to keep us at a distance.

Instead, the scenes of dramatic conflict, decision and choice are played off for jokes and it's really effective, always earning belly laughs with its brilliant one-liners without feeling like it's silly. Perhaps its nervous laughter but it makes for an entertaining and interesting film. Michael Douglas is terrific as Liberace. I've never seen him take a character on like this. He's nearly up there with Sean Penn's Milk. It feels like it's been a while since Matt Damon has been in films I've wanted to watch and with this and Elysium, I've forgotten how reliable a lead he is. The characters inhabit a flashy world, but its kept on the costumes and sets which are incidental more than anything and the style of the film is kept subtle, besides a great choice of swooping cameras. It does have its flaws with nearly soap opera-esque structure and conflict but my expectations were very low so this is a pleasant surprise. I think I even prefer it to Side Effects.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42325,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2013-05-26","keywords":"pianist,gay adoption,boy toy,gay relationship,based on real person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi510240281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMDc4NTM2OTFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA2NTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMDc4NTM2OTFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA2NTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000140/","name":"Michael Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024560/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1281443/","name":"Scott Thorson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5674732/","name":"Alex Thorleifson"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="
