programme.title: Bez oduševljenja, molim!
programme.desc: Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larryja Davida u ovoj hvaljenoj humorističnoj seriji u verité stilu koja ga prati kod kuće, na poslu i po gradu dok se suočava s raznim problemima s izmišljenim i stvarnim ličnostima. U sporednim ulogama glume Jeff Garlin i Cheryl Hines.

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

credits.actor: David Huggard, D.J. 'Shangela' Pierce, Caldwell Tidicue, Ana Bernhardi

programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Iako je sputava Molly, dugogodišnja najbolja prijateljica i korporativna odvjetnica koja se sjajno snalazi pred raznim odborima, ali ne i s osjećajima, Issa je strastvena graditeljica zajednice iz Inglewooda čija neodlučnost često omete njezinu viziju. Radnja se nastavlja nedugo nakon što su obje prijateljice dobile nogu od svojih partnera. Peta i posljednja sezona prati naše glavne junakinje, uz smiješnu Kelli i zahtjevnu Tiffany, kako pokušavaju stati na noge i nastaviti sa životom.

programme.title: Dystopia
Crno jezero: Distopija
programme.desc:
Dystopia: With Lola Zackow, Madeleine Martin, Johan Hafezi, Erik Bolin. Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt14111834/","name":"Dystopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM3NDZhZmEtZjY3NS00NGIxLTg1NWMtNmRjZjQ4NDk2YTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY0MTE3NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14111834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"music-richardmichaelsson"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Creepy, unsettling and best Swedish TV-series in Years","reviewBody":"I'll say right off the bat, I didn't really know who some of these Swedish actors were but as a resident of Sweden since a while back I had seen Johan Hedenberg. A wonderful actor.

What struck me right away was the extremely good, scored intro, the music throughout Dystopia is of I am a genuine fan of classic horror, so I was a bit suspicious when I heard VIAPLAY was doing Dystopia but boy was I surprised for a number of reasons.

The first is it kept me wondering what exactly was going on. There was just enough there to build atmosphere and tension without giving away the surprise. And it was delivered with such skill and care that it truly unfolded masterfully. You know something is wrong. You know something is up. But you can't quite figure out what it is. The Director of Dystopia is Richard Jarnhed and I need to keep an eye out for his future endeavors as he is madly talented.

And secondly this was directed by just one director. Richard directed all 8 episodes and that's not normal in Scandinavia.

And lastly, it gave us something new. This is possibly the best aspect because I am sick to death of cookie cutter horror movies. People nowadays have forgotten that horror doesn't just mean blood and guts. Before directors had to create tension and atmosphere by building the plot and unraveling the story slowly. It's refreshing to see this done with such care.

The acting is wonderful and directing is amazing. I was totally blown away by the music!

It is always nice to see a TV-series with some twists, and also those that give you some food for thought.

I am a bit blown away by the rather week reviews in Swedish press. One outlet even writes that it's outside the box and that they love the box. I am sure Dystopia will do very well internationally!

If you like Horror tension and at the same time mystery tension you should see Dystopia.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2021-06-13","keywords":"lesbian kiss,lesbian sex,topless female nudity,larp,larpers","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11198177/","name":"Lola Zackow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4477198/","name":"Madeleine Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7154476/","name":"Johan Hafezi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004517/"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: A Star Is Born: Directed by Bradley Cooper. With Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Andrew Dice Clay. A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1517451/","name":"A Star Is Born","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE5ZmE3OGItNTdlNC00YmMxLWEzNjctYzAwOGQ5ODg0OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1517451/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"silvaback-13517"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"This old Marines thoughts","reviewBody":"I did not want to watch this movie but took my wife to see it, because we both saw the one with Kris Kristofferson and Barbra Streisand, growing up. The crowd was a lot older than we were(we are almost 50) it was the biggest screen they had at our theater and seats a lot but it was maybe half full on Sunday afternoon. Not one dry eye in the place, it had a great tempo and didn't drag on or have any lulls in the story. We were both very pleased and are still engaging in conversations about the movie. It's my opinion to highly recommend to everyone go out and watch a great movie and a heartfelt movie that redefines love in this time and age we live in. That is my two cents, hope you enjoy as much as we have.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359208,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-05","keywords":"alcoholism,tinnitus,rising star,singer songwriter,singer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi94288665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744839/","name":"Eric Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3391497/","name":"Will Fetters"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Na temelju revolucionarne dramske serije "Ženske priče", druga sezona "Ljubav je ljubav: Generacija Q" nastavlja pratiti isprepletene živote Bette Porter (Jennifer Beals), Shane McCutcheon. Na temelju revolucionarne dramske serije "Ženske priče", druga sezona "Ljubav je ljubav: Generacija Q" nastavlja pratiti isprepletene živote Bette Porter (Jennifer Beals), Shane McCutcheon (Katherine Moennig) i Alice Pieszecki (Leisha Hailey) s mlađom generacijom raznovrsnih, samouvjerenih LGBTQIA likova, koji proživljavaju ljubav, tugu, seks, zapreke i uspjeh u Los Angelesu.

programme.title: Američka priča
programme.desc: Spencer osjeća pritisak i zna da mora odigrati utakmicu svog života jer još pokušava slijediti svoj san o igranju "footballa". Jordan donosi riskantnu odluku o "footballu". Spencer osjeća pritisak i zna da mora odigrati utakmicu svog života jer još pokušava slijediti svoj san o igranju "footballa". Jordan donosi riskantnu odluku o "footballu". Olivia prisustvuje novom sastanku anonimnih ovisnika u potrazi za sponzorom, ali zabrinuta je hoće li pogrešno izabrati. Coop otkriva Layli neke informacije o Laylinu ocu. U međuvremenu Billy i Laura šokiraju se kad čuju što im je Jordan prešutio.

programme.title: Američka priča
programme.desc: Kad skaut s fakulteta dođe razgovarati sa Spencerom, mora odlučiti isplate li se uvjeti. Billy shvati da se igra regrutiranja promijenila i ima ideju kako pomoći svojim igračima. Kad skaut s fakulteta dođe razgovarati sa Spencerom, mora odlučiti isplate li se uvjeti. Billy shvati da se igra regrutiranja promijenila i ima ideju kako pomoći svojim igračima. Kad policija upuca mladu crnkinju, to jako pogodi Oliviju koja poduzima drastične mjere kako bi postigla pravdu. Jordan se ne snalazi sa svime što se događa pa mu Spencer, Asher i J. J. pokušavaju pomoći. Laylu inspirira Coop kada Coop učini nešto nesebično i u dobru svrhu. U međuvremenu Grace sazna nešto o ravnatelju Carteru što ga prikazuje u drukčijem svjetlu.

programme.title: Američka priča
programme.desc: Kad se istina sazna, Laura je bijesna i mora se suočiti s posljedicama. Kad se istina sazna, Laura je bijesna i mora se suočiti s posljedicama. Vidjevši što se sve događa, Spencer ne želi sjediti po strani te zamoli svoje suigrače za nešto što bi moglo ugroziti ostatak njihove sezone. Billy se sam nosi s nečim osobnim, ali nakon razgovora s tatom shvati što se stvarno dogodilo. U međuvremenu, Simone je zabrinuta za Jordana i obraća se svojim prijateljima za pomoć.

credits.actor: Daniel Ezra, Bre-Z, Greta Onieogou, Samantha Logan, Michael Evans Behling, Cody Christian, Karimah Westbrook, Monet Mazur

programme.title: Američka priča
programme.desc: Kad Spencerov bek mora propustiti utakmicu protiv Westlakea, Spencer stavlja dodatni pritisak na sebe i mlade suigrače zbog onoga što je na kocki. Kad Spencerov bek mora propustiti utakmicu protiv Westlakea, Spencer stavlja dodatni pritisak na sebe i mlade suigrače zbog onoga što je na kocki. Billy i Jordan zabrinu su kad se Willie ne pojavi na utakmici kako je obećao, a Billy doznaje nešto neočekivano o Willieju. Laura se mora nositi s novim problemčićem na poslu zbog kojeg Olivia prepušta Lauri da donese tešku odluku. U međuvremenu, Spencer se prisjeća prošlosti uoči Coopina 18. rođendana, a Layla i Preach sukobljavaju se oko toga kako ga proslaviti.

credits.actor: Daniel Ezra, Bre-Z, Greta Onieogou, Samantha Logan, Michael Evans Behling, Cody Christian, Karimah Westbrook, Monet Mazur

programme.title: Američka priča
programme.desc: Kako se Spencerova srednjoškolska nogometna karijera bliži kraju, on počinje zamišljati kako bi mogla izgledati njegova budućnost. Kako se Spencerova srednjoškolska nogometna karijera bliži kraju, on počinje zamišljati kako bi mogla izgledati njegova budućnost. Jordan postaje zabrinut za svoju nogometnu budućnost, a Asher otkriva da mu Montes nešto taji. Grace pokušava provesti lijepu večer nakon što je saznala dobre vijesti, ali Dillon pronalazi način da to pokvari. U međuvremenu, grupa organizira prijateljsko okupljanje kod Layle, ali čini se da nisu svi dobrodošli.

credits.actor: Daniel Ezra, Samantha Logan, Michael Evans Behling, GeffriMaya, Peyton 'Alex' Smith, Kelly Jenrette, Cory Hardrict, Sylvester Powell

programme.title: The Grudge
Kletva
programme.desc:
The Grudge: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall. An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror. It's a great watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":142390,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"elderly,housewife,pet cat,bus,male frontal nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Grudge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi761242649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Grudge"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004736/","name":"Jason Behr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0245112/","name":"Clea DuVall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167921/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839812/","name":"Stephen Susco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0391198, Title: The Grudge, --- Description: The Grudge: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall. An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh","dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror.
